name: East Bernstadt Independent School
description: East Bernstadt Independent School is a public K-8 school district serving students in East Bernstadt, Kentucky. The school provides comprehensive education including elementary and middle school programs, special education services, preschool, and various extracurricular activities. The school offers academic support, counseling services, and family resource programs.
source: Verified from official website and staff directory
eligibility_requirements: Open to all students in the East Bernstadt Independent School District. Preschool programs available for eligible children.
populations_served: Students in grades K-8, families in East Bernstadt area, children with special needs
cost_information: Free public education. Some fees may apply for extracurricular activities.
